channel.title: Source?
channel.description:
hi, im basically looking to find any 317 source without client that works with mopar and/or silab clients the features i want: command handler(dont absolutely need this but would like it!) summoning (need it!) monster drops(project 16 v6 did not have this and it would have owned with drops tho) thats about it! im not a picky coder i would try2 find a blank source and code it up, but i tryed with project 16 and got no npcdrops so yea, but! im not a lazy coder, i know my way around sources, and i have attemped to add summoning to several sources along with ipanel and command handler, just having slight issues which i posted and not many ppl posted bak......so yea any recommendations would help!
p.s. if im in wrong section for this plz let me know or move it!
